metadata.name: Release Tasks

templates.title: Create Production Build
templates.description: Create a production-ready build for release deployment.

templates.title: Deploy to Staging Environment
templates.description: Deploy the production build to the staging environment for final validation.

templates.title: Final QA Validation
templates.description: Perform final QA validation in the staging environment before production release.

templates.title: Security Review
templates.description: Conduct security review of the changes before production deployment.

templates.title: Performance Testing
templates.description: Conduct performance testing to ensure the changes meet performance requirements.

templates.title: Create Rollback Plan
templates.description: Create a detailed rollback plan in case the deployment needs to be reverted.

templates.title: Deploy to Production
templates.description: Deploy the validated build to the production environment.

templates.title: Post-Deployment Monitoring
templates.description: Monitor the production environment after deployment to ensure stability.

templates.title: Update Release Documentation
templates.description: Update documentation to reflect the changes included in this release.

templates.title: User Notification
templates.description: Notify users about the new release and any important changes or features.
